CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Tectonic Financial Inc is a financial holding company that offers banking, trust, investment advisory, securities brokerage, and insurance services to high net worth individuals, small businesses, and institutions. It operates through two business segments including Banking and Other financial services.
